title: Mueller Report Release, Trump/Kim Summit, 2020
itunes:title: Mueller Report Release, Trump/Kim Summit, 2020
description:
Kevin discusses the CNN report that Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s office may be close to finalizing the Russia probe by next week, US/China trade negotiations and the 2020 presidential campaign with guests Scott Mulhauser, Founder of Aperture Strategies and Former Chief of Staff @ the U.S. Embassy in Beijing and Terry Sullivan, Founding Partner at Firehouse Strategies Public Relations and former Marco Rubio presidential campaign manager.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Kevin discusses the CNN report that Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s office may be close to finalizing the Russia probe by next week, US/China trade negotiations and the 2020 presidential campaign with guests Scott Mulhauser, Founder of Aperture Strategies and Former Chief of Staff @ the U.S. Embassy in Beijing and Terry Sullivan, Founding Partner at Firehouse Strategies Public Relations and former Marco Rubio presidential campaign manager.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
